products.title: Aarika Girl's Layered Dress
products.desc: Make your little darling look pretty and adorable wearing this black coloured dress from Aarika. Comfortable to wear all day long, this dress is made from soft fabric that is delicate against the skin.

products.title: FTCBazar Boy's Kurta and Dhoti Pant Set
products.desc: A full sleeves Kurta and dhoti pant set for your little master form the house of FTCBazar. Beautiful thread embroidery and contrast  color dhoti gives this set an elegant, traditional look. The fabric, ensures maximum comfort.

products.title: FS Mini Klub T-shirt Baby Boy's Combo
products.desc: FS Mini Klub presents this cute T-shirt and shorts set for your little hero. The cute Print tee and shorts makes the set appear adorable. Soft fabric, round neck t-shirt makes the set comfortable to wear all day long..

products.title: Bio kid Infant Baby boy's Jumpsuit
products.desc: Pure & soft cotton body suit makes your kid feels comfortable. Full romper body suit keeps the little one warm & comfortable.

products.title: Infant Baby boy's Jumpsuit
products.desc: Lend your baby beautiful look by dressing her up in this jumpsuit. Fashioned from soft fabric, this regular-fit jumpsuit will keep her at ease all day long. Features front button placket and cute embroidery.

products.title: Kaatru Boy's shirt and Dhoti set
products.desc: Your 'Desi' dapper lad is going to enjoy this super comfy and fun dhoti kurta this season. Kurta paired with an uber cool yellow dhoti is sure to make him a head turner.

products.title: Mothercare Baby Boy's Romper
products.desc: These high quality full sleeves plain romper are very soft and comfortable. The skin friendly material ensures total comfort and convenience for your kids. Adorable rompers are made of soft cotton fabric which is soft and gentle against your child's delicate skin. Comes in side zip opening.

products.title: Poppins T-Shirt Baby Boy's combo
products.desc: Poppins presents sleeveless T-Shirt and shorts for your little one. Cute print on stripe T-Shirt and shorts makes a stylish set. Kids will be comfortable all day long.

products.title: Skdc Girl's Empire Waist Dress
products.desc: The cute little flower at the empire waist adds to the charm. The whole dress is cotton lined to maintain the comfort of your child. This dress is perfect for any festival or party occasion.

products.title: FS Mini Klub Boy's Printed Casual Shirt
products.desc: Stylish half sleeves shirt from the house of FS Mini Klub. Trendy print and collar neck makes it attractive and stylish. Kids will be comfortable all day long.

products.title: Arrow Sport Men's  Self design casual shirt
products.desc: Look stylish and trendy by wearing this black blue coloured casual shirt for men from Arrow Sports. Made from linen, this regular-fit shirt has full sleeves. You can team this shirt with matching bottoms to complete your casual look.

products.title: Bigidea Striped Men's  Henley T-shirt
products.desc: Designed for urban men is this blue coloured Henley T-shirt from Bigidea. A must-have in your casual wear collection, this full-sleeved Henley T-shirt features stripes all over and a stylishly designed neck that will surely add a unique charm to your casual look. Made from polycotton, this regular-fit T-shirt offers sweat-free comfort all day long..

products.title: Feels good slim fit Men's trousers
products.desc: Complete your smart look wearing these beige coloured chinos from Feels good. Made from cotton, these chinos will last a long time. Featuring a smooth finish, these chinos can be clubbed with a trendy T-shirt for a dashing look.

products.title: Gdivine full sleeve solid men's sweatshirt
products.desc: Look sporty and feel warm by wearing this grey coloured track jacket for men from Gdivine. Made from polyester, this regular-fit jacket has a zipper on the front. You can team this jacket with matching track pants to look smart.

products.title: Koolpal's Men's  Solid Formal shirt
products.desc: Smarten up your formal look for your Monday office with this black shirt from Koolpal. Tailored in slim fit from cotton, this shirt ensures maximum comfort. You can team this full-sleeved shirt with a pair of trousers and leather lace-ups to complete your look.

products.title: Lee Marc Slim Fit Men's Jeans
products.desc: Lee Marc presents these blue coloured jeans that are especially designed for the urbane and fashionable men. These slim-fit jeans will ensure a comfortable fit, courtesy the denim fabric. Team these jeans with a shirt and loafers while heading out with friends.

products.title: Max men's checkered casual shirt
products.desc: Get a stylish and smart look wearing this casual shirt for men from Max. Made from cotton, this chequered shirt has regular fit. You can team this shirt with jeans or trousers to look smart.

products.title: Max regular fit Men's trouser
products.desc: Make a striking fashion statement wearing these beige chinos by Max. Exuding elegance and class, these slim-fit trousers will go well with polo T-shirts and casual shirts. The soft stretch cotton fabric further promises ultimate comfort.

products.title: max solid casual shirt
products.desc: Look stylish and trendy by wearing this casual shirt for men from Max. Made from cotton, this regular-fit shirt has full sleeves. You can team this shirt with matching bottoms to complete your casual look.

products.title: Reebok Printed Men's Round Neck T-shirt
products.desc: An excellent pick for fitness or workout sessions is this black T-shirt from Reebok. Designed for urbane men, this round-neck T-shirt is perfect for training sessions, morning walks and gym sessions. Made from a blend of 60% cotton and 40% polyester, this round-neck T-shirt will offer sweat-free comfort all day long..

products.title: United colors of Benetton Striped Men's Polo t shirt
products.desc: Look unique and smart by wearing this navy blue coloured casual T-shirt for men from United Colors of Benetton. Made from cotton, this chequered shirt is easy to style and comfortable to wear. You can team it with jeans or chinos to look stylish.

products.title: Adidas Originals Printed Women's Round Neck T-shirt
products.desc: Smart and trendy, this black top for women from adidas Originals will surely make your day. This cotton top comes with half-sleeves, round-neck and is highlighted with trefoil print at the front. Wear this top with a pair of jeggings and casual shoes for an uninterrupted comfort while you enjoy a fun-filled day with your friends.

products.title: Cottinfab Women's Maxi Dress
products.desc: Stow away your old stuff as you wear this dress from the house of Cottinfab. Made of premium quality rayon, this dress is high on comfort. Club it with platform heels to look astonishingly charming.

products.title: Covo Women's Leggings
products.desc: Complete your trendy look by pairing up your favourite top or tunic with these black coloured leggings. Soft to touch and skin friendly, these leggings for women are quite comfortable to wear. Offering an amazing fit, these leggings will be a great addition to your wardrobe.

products.title: Sangria Women's Top
products.desc: Look graceful and iconic wearing this black top from Sangria. Featuring an eye-catching pattern, this printed top will go well with jeans, jeggings or denims. The fine cotton fabric further ensures a soft feel.

products.title: Elle Women's A-line Dress
products.desc: You will surely steal the attention of every eye when you wear this black dress by ELLE. Featuring a zip detailing on the neckline, it has a striking pleat pattern on the skirt area. Made of fine polyester blend fabric, this sleeveless creation also ensures a featherlike fee.

products.title: Folkfore Printed Women's Straight Kurta
products.desc: Box the sartorial elegance and push it down the road wearing kurta by Folklore. Made from viscose spandex, this kurta is light in weight and perfect for daily wear. Team it with contrasting churidar and Kolhapuris to complete your look for the day.

products.title: Indianwagon casual Sleeveless Printed Women's Top
products.desc: Try out this black top from Indianwagon and create an inspiring look for a spring outing. The abstract print of this boat-neck top makes it appealing. Made of 100 % polyester fabric, this top is lightweight and skin friendly. You can team it with a pair of taper-leg trousers and strappy heels to look good.

products.title: Taanshi Printed Fashion crepe saree
products.desc: Look ravishingly beautiful wearing this yellow coloured saree from Taanshi. Fashioned from georgette, this saree is easy to drape and comfortable to wear. This saree will look best when teamed with matching danglers and bangles. This saree measures 5.5 m and comes with a 0.8 m blouse piece.

products.title: Tarini Solid Women's Gathered Skirt
products.desc: Get a trendy and catchy look by wearing this blue coloured maxi skirt that comes from Tarini. Made from dupion silk, this skirt is moderately flared. You can team this skirt with a printed top to complete your casual look.

products.title: Tokyo  Talkies Women's Shift Dress
products.desc: Jet from day to night with ease wearing dress by Tokyo Talkies. Crafted from 100% polyester, it will keep you comfortable throughout the party. Its unique design and beautiful colour will fetch a lot of second glances as you club it with contrast coloured pumps and flashy accessory.
